participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and a bit sarcastic, Emily often expresses her thoughts in a direct manner.
participant_1.background: I've a german shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. My husband is adopted. I like to watch NHL hockey.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Confident and ambitious, James tends to have a polished and articulate way of speaking.
participant_2.background: I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. My parents are very wealthy bankers. I grew up in Manhattan. I plan to go to business school next year. I drive a BMW.
